articles.title: Royal fans claim Prince Louis is 'the spitting image' of Michael Middleton - Daily Mail
articles.description: Royals fans have gone wild over Prince Louis' striking resemblance to Kate Middleton's father, Michael, 71. Taking to the comments section, one person penned: 'They're like peas in a pod.'
